author: chris-dollin
msg: Contune to refactor common code out of [Faster]PatternStage into ...Base.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Refactoring PatternStage to reduce duplication with FasterPatternStage

author: chris-dollin
msg: Extracted Matcher and StageElement classes into PatternStage (from
FasterPatternStage) and then pushed them out as independant classes.
Added test cases for them. Refactored FasterPatternStage to use the
extracted classes. Adjusted PatternStage to reduce unnecessary matching
(and this eliminates a bug in the use of direct-subclass via query).
